1.0.name: wordpress/stop-acta-ribbon
1.0.description: A black ribbon with the words "Stop ACTA" will be put on in the top right corner of your website, linking to the Stop ACTA website. Look at the screenshots to see how the ribbon looks. Check out the Help Stop SOPA/PIPA entry in the WordPress news too. Thank you for showing your support!
